rules_text:
This artifact enters with a +1/+1 counter.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
{1}{U}: The next time this artifact would be put into a graveyard, return it to its owner’s hand instead.
